channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Chateau DIY
channel.desc: Sarah and George put a chef through his paces on the hunt for the perfect wedding caterer.

channel.title: Design For You
channel.desc: Carin van Heerden from Carne Interiors showcases her latest vintage masterpiece. Designers Michelle & Craige from Metanoia Collective discuss The Science & Art of Materials in Design.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: The House JK Built
channel.desc: Sir John Kirwan and his wife Fiorella embark on an ambitious home design journey and decide to either renovate or completely demolish their family holiday home.

channel.title: Rochelle Humes...
channel.desc: S1/E8'. Assistant Headteacher Laura, husband Henry and their two children live in West London and are in desperate need of more space and storage.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: We look at way to keep arteries healthy as well as the role vitamin plays. We explore dance as way to keep fit. We discuss treatment modalities for sexual dysfunction in women.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Carlo's Reno Rescue
channel.desc: Carlos, Jarrod and Jewel are working to help disadvantaged locals learn, renovating a classroom area at the Brown Butterbean?s gym.

channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Find Me A Beach House
channel.desc: Michael and Jade are looking for their dream beach home in beautiful Byron Bay in northern New South Wales. They are enjoying early retirement and want to be close to the beach.

channel.title: Chateau DIY

channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules

channel.title: Ten Minute Kitchen
